parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> Arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.92

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets individual unit behaviour on every unit in a group and additionally tries to force this behaviour to the unit's group. Alternatively see [[setCombatBehaviour]]. Behaviour is one of: 
* "CARELESS"
* "SAFE"
* "AWARE"
* "COMBAT"
* "STEALTH".
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> See [[AI Behaviour]] for details of the effect of this command on AI units.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> groupName [[setBehaviourStrong]] behaviour

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> groupName: [[Group]] or [[Object]] - unit from the group

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> behaviour: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_group1 [[setBehaviourStrong]] "SAFE";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setCombatBehaviour]], [[combatBehaviour]], [[AIBehaviour]], [[behaviour]], [[setBehaviour]], [[setWaypointBehaviour]], [[combatMode]], [[setCombatMode]], [[skill]], [[setSkill]], [[Arma 3 AI Skill]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
